product_name: The North Face Kings Canyon 2 Footprint
long_description: Use this nylon footprint under The North Face Kings Canyon 2 tent to protect its floor from abrasion and wear. Sizing specific to the tent prevents water from pooling between the tent and footprint in rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment.
short_description: Use this nylon footprint under The North Face Kings Canyon 2 tent to protect its floor from abrasion and wear.
